Name: NoAmmo
About the game: You are a tanker who has run out of shells, your rifle has run out of bullets, you are wounded and powerless, but you must complete the task, so despite the crowds of enemy soldiers, you continue to move forward, transferring your coordinates to the base and praying for a victorious end! No Ammo is an action game where the player acts as a tanker without shells and bullets. You need to get to the finish line without breaking the tank & while enemy soldiers jump out on your way, your time will be very limited. Game Features: - Limited time to complete levels - Unique pixel-visual style - Multiple levels
